String.string: Fight off {@creature:45#2001#argonomorph blood fiends} in the eastern part of the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper}.
Break the cyadal pylons in the eastern part of the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper} and collect samples.
Deliver the samples to Rennie at {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity}.
